body:
I know this may seem ridiculous for you prestiges but they give too little xp from a kill. 2 xp really I finish a nebula game and I get like 1 bar of xp.
I am not be a jerk about the situation but could you raise it to 5 or 4 maybe 3 just not too low
body_tagged:

title: Low xp from kills

replies.body:
If you want to earn XP faster then you'll need to get a donator rank. The XP multiplier is one of main purposes of them.

I know it can be frustrating at times, but that's part of the challenge. Earning prestiges isn't supposed to be an easy thing to do.
replies.body_tagged:

I know it can be frustrating at times, but that's part of the challenge. Earning prestiges isn't supposed to be an easy thing to do.

replies.body: I got 5th prestige level 50 without a donator rank, if I can do it, you can!
replies.body_tagged: I got 5th prestige level 50 without a donator rank, if I can do it, you can!

replies.body: But you glitchy-wun, you are op, that's not the same :o
